titleStmt.title: The laboryouse iourney [and] serche of Iohan Leylande, for Englandes antiquitees geuen of hym as a newe yeares gyfte to Kynge Henry the viij. in the. xxxvij. yeare of his reygne, with declaracyons enlarged: by Iohan Bale
titleStmt.author: Leland, John, 1506?-1552.

editionStmt.edition: This text is an enriched version of the TCP digital transcription A13863 of text S2370 in the English Short Title Catalog (STC 24168.5). Textual changes and metadata enrichments aim at making the text more computationally tractable, easier to read, and suitable for network-based collaborative curation by amateur and professional end users from many walks of life. The text has been tokenized and linguistically annotated with MorphAdorner. The annotation includes standard spellings that support the display of a text in a standardized format that preserves archaic forms ('loveth', 'seekest'). Textual changes aim at restoring the text the author or stationer meant to publish.

respStmt.resp: This text has not been fully proofread

fileDesc.extent: Approx. 131 KB of XML-encoded text transcribed from 65 1-bit group-IV TIFF page images.

publicationStmt.pubPlace: Evanston,IL, Notre Dame, IN, St. Louis, MO

availability.p: This keyboarded and encoded edition of the work described above is co-owned by the institutions providing financial support to the Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership. This Phase I text is available for reuse, according to the terms of Creative Commons 0 1.0 Universal . The text can be copied, modified, distributed and performed, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.

Bale, John, 1495-1563. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S. Mierdman for John Bale] To be sold [by R. Foster] in fletestrete at the signe of the Croune next vnto the whyte Fryears gate,

notesStmt.note: Colophon reads "Emprented at London by Iohan Bale, Anno. M.D.XLIX." Actual function of Bale as publisher, and Foster's name, from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
